name: Terratangier
description:
It's a puzzle platformer in which you have to put on and take off a VR helmet to switch between the matrix and reality, plot a route and solve puzzles. And you might spot spoons in some places.

Controls:
"Left" & "Right" Arrow keys - Walk
"Up" Arrow key - Jump
"Spacebar" - On/Off VR-Helmet
"F11" Key - Fullscreen On/Off


Team that created the game:

Misha Flash (Coder, Level-Designer, Game-Designer, Tester)

VoidMan (Spriter)

Blaze Games (Game-Designer)

Game created for b3agz Jam 2023

Made with Construct 3
